Kinetic typography refers to the creation of moving text in video form. It is a group of animation techniques that are used to make words bounce, grow, shrink, fly, move quickly or slowly, change color and many other ways for the viewer. The effect can be simple and short with only small changes or quite elaborate and lengthy.
